meanings.definition: Granting of a pardon to a group of people
meanings.sent1: The amnestied individuals were relieved to have their past mistakes forgiven.
meanings.sent2: The amnestied group of protesters were able to start fresh without fear of punishment.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated the amnestied citizens with a big party in the park.
meanings.sent4: The concept of amnesty felt like a warm hug to the amnestied community.
meanings.sent5: The news of the amnestied prisoners spread quickly throughout the small town.

meanings.definition: To grant a pardon to a group of people
meanings.sent1: The president amnestied the political prisoners, allowing them to return to their families.
meanings.sent2: The judge decided to amnesty the group of protestors for their peaceful demonstration.
meanings.sent3: The mayor jokingly amnestied all parking tickets issued on April Fool's Day.
meanings.sent4: The teacher amnestied the students' late homework assignments as a one-time exception.
meanings.sent5: The king's decree amnestied all those who had committed minor offenses in the kingdom.
